API docs by Redocly

meNexus Synapse API (0.3.0-alpha)

Download OpenAPI specification:

The meNexus Synapse API for v0.3.0-alpha

activities

Operations related to activities like posts, messages, and comments

Get all activities for the Synapse

List all activities across the local Synapse

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
query Parameters
limit
integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
Default: 50

Max results to return

cursor
string

Opaque cursor for forward pagination

activityType
string (ActivityType)
Enum: "post" "message" "comment" "reaction" "join" "leave" "follow" "custom"

Filter by activity type

spaceId
string (Slug) [ 1 .. 64 ] characters ^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$

Filter by space ID

Responses

The URL will depend on the context of your Synapse

http://localhost:3002/synapse/activities

WebSocket server for realtime updates

ws://localhost:3002/synapse/activities

Response samples

  • 200
  • 401
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "items": [
    • {
      • "activityId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"
      }
    ],
  • "nextCursor": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9"
}

List activities from specified space

List activities for a space identified by type and slug. Use query params to filter by activity type or parent.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
spaceType
required
string (SpaceType)
Enum: "feed" "chat" "conversation" "voice" "custom"

Space type (e.g., feed, chat, conversation, voice)

spaceSlug
required
string [ 1 .. 64 ] characters ^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$

URL-safe space identifier unique per {synapse, spaceType}

query Parameters
limit
integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
Default: 50

Max results to return

cursor
string

Opaque cursor for forward pagination

activityType
string (ActivityType)
Enum: "post" "message" "comment" "reaction" "join" "leave" "follow" "custom"

Filter by activity type (e.g., post, message, comment)

parentId
string <uuid>

Filter by parent activity ID (e.g., for comments on a post)

Responses

The URL will depend on the context of your Synapse

http://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/activities

WebSocket server for realtime updates

ws://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/activities

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 401
  • 404
  • 429
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "items": [
    • {
      • "activityId": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"
      }
    ],
  • "nextCursor": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9"
}

Create activity in specified space

Create an activity in the specified space (e.g., post, message, comment)

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
spaceType
required
string (SpaceType)
Enum: "feed" "chat" "conversation" "voice" "custom"

Space type (e.g., feed, chat, conversation, voice)

spaceSlug
required
string [ 1 .. 64 ] characters ^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$

URL-safe space identifier unique per {synapse, spaceType}

Request Body schema: application/json
required
activityType
required
string (ActivityType)
Enum: "post" "message" "comment" "reaction" "join" "leave" "follow" "custom"

Kind of activity performed.

content
required
string non-empty
parentId
string <uuid>
mediaUris
Array of strings <uri> (MediaUri) [ items <uri > ]

Responses

The URL will depend on the context of your Synapse

http://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/activities

WebSocket server for realtime updates

ws://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/activities

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "activityType": "post",
  • "content": "string",
  • "parentId": "70850378-7d3c-4f45-91b7-942d4dfbbd43",
  • "mediaUris": [
    • "http://example.com"
    ]
}

Response samples

  • 400
  • 401
  • 409
  • 422
  • 429
  • 500
Content type
application/problem+json
{
  • "type": "about:blank",
  • "title": "string",
  • "status": 0,
  • "detail": "string",
  • "instance": "http://example.com",
  • "errors": {
    • "property1": "string",
    • "property2": "string"
    }
}

Get an activity by ID

Retrieve a single activity by its ID within the space.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
spaceType
required
string (SpaceType)
Enum: "feed" "chat" "conversation" "voice" "custom"

Space type (e.g., feed, chat, conversation, voice)

spaceSlug
required
string [ 1 .. 64 ] characters ^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$

URL-safe space identifier unique per {synapse, spaceType}

activityId
required
string <uuid>

The UUID for an activity

Responses

The URL will depend on the context of your Synapse

http://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/activities/{activityId}

WebSocket server for realtime updates

ws://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/activities/{activityId}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 401
  • 404
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "activityId": "11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111",
  • "userPublicKey": "02abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678",
  • "spaceType": "feed",
  • "spaceSlug": "general",
  • "activityType": "post",
  • "content": "Hello world!",
  • "mediaUris": [
    • "https://example.com/image.jpg"
    ],
  • "createdAt": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z"
}

Upload attached media for activity

Upload media and attach it to the specified activity.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
spaceType
required
string (SpaceType)
Enum: "feed" "chat" "conversation" "voice" "custom"

Space type (e.g., feed, chat, conversation, voice)

spaceSlug
required
string [ 1 .. 64 ] characters ^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$

URL-safe space identifier unique per {synapse, spaceType}

activityId
required
string <uuid>

The UUID for an activity

Request Body schema: multipart/form-data
required
file
required
string <binary>

Uploaded file (max size: 10MB, supported types: image/, video/, audio/*)

Responses

The URL will depend on the context of your Synapse

http://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/activities/{activityId}/media

WebSocket server for realtime updates

ws://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/activities/{activityId}/media

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 401
  • 415
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "mediaId": "5a8ffac5-2288-485d-b463-90c3cd9941ad",
  • "uri": "http://example.com"
}

Sign crypto challenge and login

Verify signature over crypto challenge and mint access/refresh tokens

Request Body schema: application/json
required
userPublicKey
required
string (HexCompressedPublicKey) = 66 characters ^(02|03)[0-9a-fA-F]{64}$
challenge
required
string = 64 characters ^[0-9a-fA-F]{64}$
signature
required
string = 128 characters ^[0-9a-fA-F]{128}$

Responses

The URL will depend on the context of your Synapse

http://localhost:3002/auth/login

WebSocket server for realtime updates

ws://localhost:3002/auth/login

  • Payload
Content type

  • "challenge": "stringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstri",
  • "signature": "stringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringstringst"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 401
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "accessToken": "string",
  • "tokenType": "Bearer",
  • "expiresIn": 0
}

Rotate refresh token and mint a new access token

Reads the httpOnly refreshToken cookie, validates it, rotates it (sets a new refresh token cookie), and returns a fresh access token.

Authorizations:
refreshCookie

Responses

The URL will depend on the context of your Synapse

  • 429
  • 500

{
  • "accessToken": "string",
  • "tokenType": "Bearer",
  • "expiresIn": 0
}

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
spaceType
required
string (SpaceType)

spaceSlug
required
string [ 1 .. 64 ] characters ^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$

query Parameters

integer [ 1 .. 200 ]
Default: 50

Max results to return

cursor
string

Opaque cursor for forward pagination

string (ActivityType)
Enum: "post" "message" "comment" "reaction" "join" "leave" "follow" "custom"

parentId
string <uuid>

voice

Voice session management

Start a voice session

Start a voice session within the specified space.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
spaceType
required
string (SpaceType)
Enum: "feed" "chat" "conversation" "voice" "custom"

Space type (e.g., feed, chat, conversation, voice)

spaceSlug
required
string [ 1 .. 64 ] characters ^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$

URL-safe space identifier unique per {synapse, spaceType}

Responses

The URL will depend on the context of your Synapse

http://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/voice

WebSocket server for realtime updates

ws://localhost:3002/spaces/{spaceType}/{spaceSlug}/voice

Response samples

  • 201
  • 401
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "sessionId": "f6567dd8-e069-418e-8893-7d22fcf12459"
}
